text: kernpura is a Gram panchayat in hajipur, vaishali district, bihar. ==Geography== This panchayat is located at ==panchayat office== ==Nearest City/Town== Hajipur (Distance KM) village profile census government official website State - Bihar, District- vaishali, Sub District - Hajipur ==Nearest major road highway or river== NH 19 (National highway 19 ) Map - vaishali district official government website file type: image/jpeg, size:13.9 MB ==compass== The Chief Electoral Officer of Bihar official,hajipur pdf ==Villages in panchayat== There are villages in this panchayatReports of National Panchayat Directory Ministry of Panchayati Raj Government of India List of Census Villages mapped for KERNPURA Gram Panchayat,HAJIPUR,VAISHALI,BIHAR Report printed on 26/09/2014 National Panchayat Portal,Panchayat Informatics Division {|class="wikitable" |- !s.n | !villages |- | 1||||Chak Jalal |- | 2||||Saifpur |- | 3||||Jairam Chak |- | 4||||Karanpur |- | 5||||Chak Mahmud Chisti |- | 6||||Karanpur |- | 7||||Sherpur |- | 8||||Nawada Khurd |- | 9||||Nawada Kalan |- | 10||||Bahadurpur |- | 11||||Sadullahpur satan |- | 12||||saidpur Ganesh |- | 13||||Saidpur Ganesh |- | 14||||Mohanpur Ishar Chak Khusro |- | 15||||Nawada Khurd |- | 16||||Chandni Sadullahpur Satan |- | 17||||Rampur Nausahan |- | |} ==References== Category:Villages in Vaishali district Category:Vaishali district Category:Hajipur
